channel.title: CVE Feed for NetApp -- AFF A700s Baseboard Management Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NetApp -- AFF A700s Baseboard Management Controller

item.title: CVE-2019-5497|2024-08-04T20:01:50.681Z -- netapp -- aff%20a700s%20baseboard%20management%20controller
item.description: NetApp AFF A700s Baseboard Management Controller (BMC) firmware versions 1.22 and higher were shipped with a default account enabled that could allow unauthorized arbitrary command execution.
